content.description: Livia dicit se epistulam lecturam esse.
content.question: How is the sentence translated?

choices.label: Livia said that she would read the letter to herself.
Livia said that the letter had been read by her.
Livia says that the letter was read to her.
Livia says that she will read the letter.

content.answer: Livia says that she will read the letter.
